definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Most pearls have a soft silvery-white or cream shine.
sentences.chinese: 珍珠大都有柔和的银白色或奶色光泽。

sentences.english: Sunlight reflecting off the water’s surface gives it a pale, silvery blue color.
sentences.chinese: 水面上太阳光反射让水面呈现出银白蓝色。
她的头发已变成银白色。

sentences.english: I put on my safety helmet and the glove, and sat on my silver-white colored bike.
sentences.chinese: 我带上安全帽和手套，帅气的跨上我的银白色铁马。

sentences.english: He was past sixty and had a long white beard curling down over his chest.
sentences.chinese: 他已年过六旬，银白色蜷曲的长髯披挂胸前。

sentences.english: The metallic bracelet is silver-coloured and has a metallic charm in the shape of a peace sign.
sentences.chinese: 金属手链是银白色的，有和平标识形状的坠饰。

sentences.english: When these white flowers flying all over the sky .
sentences.chinese: 当天空弥漫着这些银白的飞花。

sentences.english: The field is white and the wooded edges dark with evergreen.
sentences.chinese: 野地上银白一片，远处围绕着暗绿色的常绿树木。

sentences.english: I know an inory-faced and silvery-haired man is unlikely an angel.
sentences.chinese: 我知道有着玉色脸孔银白发丝的男人并不一定是天使。

sentences.english: The pound silvered under the moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 在目光下池塘变成了一片银白色。

sentences.english: The moon's rays tinged the mountains silver.
sentences.chinese: 月光把山脉染成了银白色。

sentences.english: Chrome is a microstrip sky-blue silvery white metal.
sentences.chinese: 铬是一种微带天蓝色的银白色金属。

sentences.english: My body is silver-white or yellowish-white with black stripes.
sentences.chinese: 我的身体是银白色或黄白色与黑色条纹相间。

sentences.english: The grey rain-curtain of this world rolls back, and all turns to silver glass, and then you see it.
sentences.chinese: 当人世间的灰色雨幕拉开，所见将是一片银白透明。

sentences.english: A faint silvery vapour stood for the Milky Way.
sentences.chinese: 那一团模糊的银白星云就是银河系的所在了。

sentences.english: A dream is more romantic than scarlet pagodas by a silver sea.
sentences.chinese: 梦中的风光比银白海洋旁边绯红的宝塔更加旖旎艳丽。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
